flawed_nl_solution:
He sold 10+12+9=<<10+12+9=31>>31 bicycles.
He bought 15+8+11=<<15+8+11=43>>43 bicycles.
He now has 43-31=<<43-31=12>>12 more than at Friday's opening.
#### 12

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 34, not 43. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
